/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a touch of life to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
